filter.inkscape:menu-tooltip: Darkens the edge with an inner blur and adds a flexible glow
filter.inkscape:label: Dark And Glow

text.tspan: - no in-game specials can be found
An option to switch off the music. This applies to
Once a score of 40,000 or higher is achieved in
COMPETITION mode, you can select a start level
The cartridge memory can be erased.
This resets the cartridge memory to its default
values, with no high scores and all options reset.
This also resets (if applicable) VecFever storage.
Will exit to the title screen.
If using a VecFever pressing button 4 will exit to
